name: WATTZ: Up-Bot
description:
In this fast-paced platformer a giant dark vortex is destroying the world and without your energy crystal it will also drain your health!
Help Wattz the robot  to survive  by climbing   blocks as quickly as possible to  regain health and avoid any dangers along the way.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Walk
  • SPACE - Jump

This game as well as most of the assets were made in 3 days for the 128th  mini jam with the theme "Health" hosted by  ZahranW.
